code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import api from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function JobPostingsPage(){const[jobs,setJobs]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const fetchJobs=async()=>{try{const res=await api.get('/job-postings');setJobs(res.data);}catch(err){console.error("Failed to fetch jobs");}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchJobs();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-[#E3DAD0] p-6",dir:"rtl",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-3xl font-black text-[#1A365D] mb-8 border-r-8 border-[#1A365D] pr-4",children:"\u0627\u0644\u0648\u0638\u0627\u0626\u0641 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u062A\u0627\u062D\u0629"}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center font-bold text-[#1A365D]",children:"\u062C\u0627\u0631\u064A \u0627\u0644\u062A\u062D\u0645\u064A\u0644..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid gap-6",children:jobs.map(job=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-6 rounded-[2.5rem] shadow-xl",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-black text-[#1A365D]",children:job.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-400 font-bold mb-4",children:job.companyName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate("/apply/".concat(job._id)),className:"bg-[#1A365D] text-white px-8 py-3 rounded-xl font-bold",children:"\u0639\u0631\u0636 \u0627\u0644\u062A\u0641\u0627\u0635\u064A\u0644 / \u062A\u0642\u062F\u064A\u0645"})]},job._id))})]});}
